column1: Art Institute of Chicago////It took me a year and a half after moving to Chicago to make it to the Art Institute. After visiting there for nearly 4 hours yesterday
column2: I'm embarrassed to admit it took me that long. Wow. WOW. I knew it was huge but never dreamed it was that big and packed full of so many incredible pieces. And after 4 hours I didn't put a dent in it. Probably saw 1/3 of what was on exhibit. The Impressionist gallery is superb
column5: and other pieces was incredible. From sculpture to modern art
column9: this place has it all. And it's all laid out in an incredible building that is itself a work of art. What an incredible resource this place is and to think it's so accessible.
